best_gem_comment: Take this class!!! As a STEM concentrator who hasn't taken an English class since high school (excluding freshman expos), the essay is approachable and well–suited for my shortening attention span. Prof. Wood is AMAZING, and the way he is able to deconstruct an essay in terms of both content and form is extraordinary to witness. This was a wonderful gem to take senior spring – highly highly recommend!
best_gem_comment_short: This was a wonderful gem to take senior spring – highly highly recommend!
